sentences.en: At present the solution for Internet QoS mainly includes: Intserv, RSVP, Diffserv and MPLS.
sentences.cn: 目前,解决Internet服务质量(QoS)问题的方法主要有: Intserv 、 RSVP 、 Diffserv、MPLS等.
比利: 回复的日期是哪一天?

sentences.en: E - NNI RSVP - TE is a major part of control plane protocol stack in ASON network.
sentences.cn: E -NNIRSVP-TE 信令协议是自动交换光网(ASON)网络控制平面协议栈的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: If the written invitation bears the initials RSVP ( Repondez s'il vous plait ), it must be answered.
sentences.cn: 如请贴上印有rsvp ( 请赐复 ) 字样, 则非答复不可.

sentences.en: If you want people to reply to an invitation, put ( RSVP ) at the bottom.
sentences.cn: 如果想让人回复邀请函, 就要在邀请函底下注明尽快回复字样 ( RSVP ).

sentences.en: Its reliability and survivability have a direct impact on the reliability of ASON.
sentences.cn: RSVP-TE的可靠性和生存性机制直接影响到ASON的 可靠性.

sentences.en: Please rsvp to reserve seats. One invitation for two persons only.
sentences.cn: 座位有限,敬请回复留座并凭邀请卡入座, 一柬仅限两人.

sentences.en: Please specify your dinner choice when you RSVP.
sentences.cn: 请尽快选择您的用餐内容.

sentences.en: The Bi - RSVP provides resource reservation for ACK packets to improve TCP performance.
sentences.cn: 该协议通过为反向ACK数据包提供资源预留以提高TCP性能.

sentences.en: The nature and advantages of RSVP.
sentences.cn: 参加[退休义工计画]的本质和好处.

sentences.en: Usually there is an RSVP card in the invitation.
